scripts.commit-pages: git add -A && git commit -m 'adding built sources'
scripts.presources: npm config set snstrauss.github.io:branchName $(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.postsources: git checkout master && git merge $npm_package_config_branchName -m 'merge branch to master'
scripts.prepages: npm run clean && npm run rollup-build
scripts.pages: npm run commit-pages && npm run deploy-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run sources && npm run pages
